<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Sync Collaborator Permissions For PAD</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
	var ownerDescriptorId = '8b0cbfc2c7132010d447c17cf4c26053';
	var ownerSynchronizer = new sn_appcollab.CollabPermissionSynchronizer(ownerDescriptorId);
	ownerSynchronizer.syncCollaboratorPermissions();

	var editorDescriptorId = '3bb75c9ec7132010d447c17cf4c2605a';
	var editorSynchronizer = new sn_appcollab.CollabPermissionSynchronizer(editorDescriptorId);
	editorSynchronizer.syncCollaboratorPermissions();
})();

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-27 20:18:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>39a046a6c7723010d447c17cf4c2608f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Sync Collaborator Permissions For PAD</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_39a046a6c7723010d447c17cf4c2608f</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
